articles.description: Follow Mac, the king of the swingers, in Morocco’s Atlas mountains. Plus: Alan Cumming appears in a scandalous documentary. Here’s what to watch this evening
articles.content:
Macaque: Monkeys in the Mountains A Dynasties Special
7.30pm, BBC One
Because its not Christmas without a David Attenborough documentary Among the Barbary macaque monkeys of Moroccos Atlas mountain… [+2808 chars]

articles.author: Lizzie May
articles.title: EastEnders fans are left in shock after a major character leaves the square but some spot a problem - Daily Mail
articles.description: Shirley Carter has experienced a heart-wrenching week for in Walford after learning  her son Mick got 'lost at sea' after a horror accident as he jumped into the English Channel.
articles.content:
EastEnders fans were left in shock on Thursday night after a major character seemingly left Albert Square.
But some eagle-eyed viewers noticed a huge problem which might suggest otherwise.
